name: Fighter
rules:
This card belongs in the Main deck.
Only one Fighter can be added to your play during the Planning Phase.

name: Move
description: Cards that are one of a character's attacks.
rules:
This card belongs in the Main deck.
Only one Move can be added to your play during the Planning Phase.

name: Aura
description: Cards that represents a character's ability or traits.
rules:
This card belongs in the Main deck.
Only one Aura can be added to your play during the Planning Phase.

name: Ending
rules:
This card belongs in the Main deck.
Only one Ending can be added to your play during the Planning Phase.

name: Event
description: Cards that depict events or activities.
rules: This card belongs in the Pluck deck.

name: Comeback
description: Cards represent a character's method of getting back into battle or how they prepare for future battles.
rules: This card belongs in the Pluck deck.

name: Item
description: Cards that are items or equipment belonging to a character.
rules: This card belongs in the Pluck deck.

name: Any Type
description: Main deck cards representing Max Variable.
rules:
This card belongs in the Main deck.
Can be used in place of any card type during the Planning Phase.
No limit to the number of Any Types that can be added.
